Description:
Located 500 metres from the city centre of Abakan, Hotel Druzhba features a sauna, an indoor swimming pool, free Wi-Fi, and an on-site restaurant serving Russian and Asian cuisine.

Rooms at Druzhba Hotel offer air conditioning, a refrigerator, a balcony, and a private bathroom with shower.

Other hotel facilities include a bar, a 24-hour front desk, laundry services, and meeting facilities. A number of restaurants can be found within 300 metres of the property.

The Kraevedcheskii Museum is 2 km from the hotel, and Park Topiarnogo Isskussta is 500 metres away. Hotel Druzhba is 3 km from Abakan Train Station. Please let the property know your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking or contact the property.

Please note that this hotel does not provide visa support.

Please note that the hotel will contact you directly regarding the prepayment of your reservation. Prepayment should be made within 5 days after booking. The hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation in case the deposit has not been transferred.

Description:
A 15-minute drive to Abakan Airport, Hotel Sibir offers comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi. It has a summer terrace and free private parking.

The modern rooms feature a seating area and cable TV. The private bathrooms come with a bath, hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a balcony and are air conditioned.

The restaurant at Sibir Hotel serves Russian cuisine and continental breakfast. Cafes and bars are a 5-minute walk away. The hotel has a shared lounge area.

The nearest bus stop is a 2-minute walk from the hotel. Abakan Train Station is 3 km away.

Description: The hotel's "Free Ride" is at the base of rest "Ergaki". "Ergaki" is located in a unique place in the Western Sayan, which is called the land of rocky mountains and blue lakes. Hotel and entertainment complex invites the whole year to relax surrounded by amazing nature, couples and groups of friends. For accommodation offers detached houses, three buildings of hotel type and two comfortable hotels. All the buildings are equipped with Central heating, Sewerage and water supply. On the basis of "Ergaki" can accommodate about 240 persons; Cozy cafe "Tavern" for 150 seats and a cafe restaurant type "FreeRide" 70 seats allow you to eat to feed their guests, to spend a holiday, party, wedding, corporate events for organizations, large companies; Five Russian baths, hot tub, massage will allow you to fully relax body and soul; While the adults relax and rest, their children can spend time in the playroom "Argue", under the supervision of an experienced teacher; Hookah bar "Temple of smoke" will treat its guests Wellness and invigorating tea, Eastern sweets, or delicious hookah; Ample Parking; Gazebos for picnics, barbecues.

Featuring a restaurant and a garden, Apartment on Aviatorov 10 provides accommodation in Abakan with free WiFi and garden views. The property features mountain views and is 19 km from Minusinsk.

The apartment comes with 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a balcony with lake views.

A childrens playground is available on site and both hiking and fishing can be enjoyed within close proximity of the apartment.

The nearest airport is Abakan International, 5 km from Apartment on Aviatorov 10, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service. A damage deposit of RUB 1000 is required on arrival. You should be reimbursed on check-out.
Managed by a private host

Apartamenty na Chertygasheva 69 features a childrens playground.

The nearest airport is Abakan International, 6 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. This property will not accommodate hen, stag or similar parties.
A damage deposit of RUB 1500 is required on arrival. This will be collected as a cash payment. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full in cash, subject to an inspection of the property.

Description:
HeadLine : In Krymsk

Location : With a stay at Guesthouse on Rodnikovaya 9 in Krymsk, you ll be 19.4 mi (31.3 km) from Dolmen in Shapsuga and 29 mi (46.7 km) from Slavyansk Town Museum of History and Local Lore. This guesthouse is 31 mi (49.9 km) from Novorossiysk State Historical Museum Reserve.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • This property accepts credit cards

Special Instructions : Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
This elegant boutique hotel in Novorossiysk is 100 metres from Lake Abrau and 6 km from the Black Sea pebbled beaches. It features free WiFi, a swimming pool, childrens playground and private beach.

The individually decorated rooms at Hotel Imperial & Champagne SPA feature unique décor. Special characteristics include stone walls, chandeliers, patterned wallpaper and claw-foot bath tubs. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, flat-screen TV and minibar. A private bathroom comes with slippers, bathrobes and Loccitane free toiletries.

A buffet breakfast is provided in the hotels bright dining room with open fireplace. European cuisine is served at the cosy Terrasse Di Lago restaurant, 500 metres away.

Hotel guests can enjoy fishing and boating, or explore the Black Sea coast on 2 wheels using the hotels bicycle rental facilities. Guests can also relax on the sunny poolside terrace.

Hotel Imperial & Champagne SPA is 24 km from Novorossiysk Train Station and 46 km from Airport Gelendzhik. Church bus stop is 500 metres from the hotel, which offers free onsite parking. Due to Coronavirus (COVID-19), wearing a face mask is mandatory in all indoor common areas.
A negative Coronavirus (COVID-19) PCR test result is mandatory to check-in to this property.

At the hotel, each room has a wardrobe. At Hotel Sport rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation.

Guests at Hotel Sport will be able to enjoy activities in and around Abrau-Dyurso, like hiking.

At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna and a Turkish bath.

Lake Abrau is 500 metres from the property and Church of Saint Blessed Xenia of St. Petersburg is 1 km away. Fishing, cycling and skiing can be enjoyed in the surroundings.

Description:
An aqua park with indoor swimming pool, Finnish sauna and a bowling alley are offered at this hotel complex in the Novo-Abzakovo ski resort. Guests enjoy a free minibus shuttle to the ski lift, 800 metres away.

Rooms at Tau-Tash Hotel Complex are warmly decorated with classic-style furniture. All rooms include cable TV and a private bathroom with shower.

A buffet breakfast and a selection of European dishes are served in the elegant restaurant, and drinks are served can be enjoyed at the bar. Free Wi-Fi is available in the bar and restaurant.

Ski equipment can be rented at the Tau-Tash Novo-Abzakovo. On-site leisure activities also include bowling, billiards, a childrens playground and a night club.

On-site parking is free at the Tau-Tash, and Novo-Abzakovo Train Station is just 800 metres away. The 24-hour reception can organise a shuttle service to Magnitogorsk Airport, 50 km away. Guests are required to show a photo identification and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
Guests are kindly asked to present their passport upon check-in.

Description:
Surrounded by pine forests, these studios and apartments are located in the resort area of Novoabzakovo. Guests can benefit from a Finnish sauna.

Gorkys accommodation is decorated in eco style with lots of wood and natural materials. Each unit includes a private entrance, a satellite TV and a kitchen area.

Breakfast is served in the main restaurant, which offers a selection of Russian and European dishes for dinner. There is also an Italian pizzeria.

Guests at The Gorky can enjoy a sauna session or arrange an excursion at the 24-hour front desk. The nearest ski lift is a 5-minute walk away, and ski equipment can be rented on site.

The property overlooks the landscape of the Southern Urals and is a 5-minute drive away from Novoabzakovo Train Station.

The classic-style rooms feature a TV, wardrobe and kettle. The private bathroom comes with a bath and free toiletries.

Smile Hotel is 60 km from Magnitogorsk Airport and 25 km from Beloretsk city centre. Novoabzakovo Train Station is a 5-minute drive away.

Description:
This hotel complex is located in Abzakovo Ski Resort, 1 km from the ski centre. Edelweiss Hotel offers free Wi-Fi and a spa area with a sauna, 2 Russian steam rooms and an indoor pool.

Interiors at Edelweiss Hotel Abzakovo are individually furnished and feature colourful décor. A TV and a private bathroom can be found in all rooms.

Breakfast is served in the café each morning.

The Edelweiss is an ideal base for skiing and snowboarding here in the Southern Urals. On-site activities also include tennis and karaoke, and there is also a childrens playground.

The hotel is 300 metres from ski-lifts, bowling and a water park.  A zoo and ski centre are located 800 metres away.

On-site parking is free at Hotel Edelweiss. It is 20 km from Beloretsk town and 60 km from Magnitogorsk.

Description:
Offering a sauna and a ski storage, 33 Bears Hotel is located in Novoabzakovo, 1.5 km from the nearest ski slope. Free WiFi access is available.

Each room here will provide you with a TV and satellite channels. There is a full a kitchenette with a refrigerator and kitchenware. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. You can enjoy mountain view from the rooms.

The on-site restaurant serves European cuisine, and a variety of drinks is offered at the bar.

At 33 Bears Hotel you will find a shuttle service, a childrens playground and a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a shared lounge and a games room. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, cycling and hiking. The property offers free parking.

Magnitogorsk is 60 km away. Please inform 33 Bears Hotel in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.
Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.
Please note that cafe Berloga is closed from 12 until 28 May 2016.

All units are equipped with a TV with cable channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower and a wardrobe.

A continental breakfast is available each morning at the hotel.

Description:
An indoor pool, Russian sauna and free Wi-Fi are offered by this hotel in the popular Novo-Abzakovo Ski Resort. Surrounded by pine trees, it stands in the Southern Ural region of Bashkortostan.

Featuring log-cabin style cottages and contemporary rooms, Usadba Elovoe Hotel offers warmly decorated accommodation. Rooms are complete with a flat-screen TV, and some also offer a balcony.

Guests can enjoy traditional food from the Bashkirian region in the hotels relaxed dining room with exposed brick décor. The Fhyto Bar also serves healthy drinks and light snacks.

 A free shuttle service to the Abzakovo Ski Lift (1.5 km) can be arranged by Usadba Elovoes 24-hour reception staff. Visitors will find the Non-Stop Entertainment Centre just 800 metres from the hotel.

Novoabzakovo Train Station is situated only 300 metres away and provides a connection to Magnitogorsk. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Alpine Chalet is situated in Novoabzakovo in the forest area, 1 km from Abzakovo Ski Resort. Free WiFi and parking are offered. Guests can enjoy the on-site cafe.

All rooms feature a bedroom and living room with a flat-screen and electric kettle. The bathroom is private, certain bathroom are fitted with a spa bath.

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play billiards at the hotel.

Ufa International Airport is 263 km away. Payment before arrival via bank transfer is required. The property will contact you after you book to provide instructions.

Description:
Located in Novoabzakovo in the Bashkortostan region, Holiday Home v Abzakovo provides accommodation with free private parking.

Each unit comes with a sofa, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a well-fitted kitchenette and a private bathroom with shower and bath. A microwave and fridge are also provided, as well as a kettle.

The holiday home offers a childrens playground.

There is a garden with a barbecue at this property and guests can go hiking and skiing nearby.

Abzakovo is 6 km from Holiday Home v Abzakovo, while Beloretsk is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Magnitogorsk, 57 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service. Description:
HeadLine : In a regional park

Location : When you stay at Sosnoviy Bor Hotel in Achinsk, you ll be in a regional park, you ll be a 8-minute drive from Achinsk Drama Theater.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 78 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining : Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the inn s coffee shop/cafe. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10:30 AM.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy
  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges
  • Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed
  • Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve onsite parking
  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash
  • Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit

Special Instructions : This property offers transfers from the airport and train station (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival.

Description:
Offering a gym and indoor pool, Hotel Viktoriya is located in Achinsk. Guests can enjoy the on-site cafe. Free private parking is available on site.

Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. You will find a kettle in the room. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Hotel Viktoriya features free WiFi .

There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.

You can play billiards at the hotel. Please note that guests can visit the propertys sauna with a discount.
